verses.verse: וְנֶ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> And when any כִּֽי־ <WH3588> now when תַקְרִ֞יב <WH7126> will offer קָרְבַּ֤ן <WH7133> offering מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> a meat לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> shall be [of] fine flour יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> his offering וְיָצַ֤ק <WH3332> and he shall pour עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> and שֶׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> oil וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> upon it and put עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and לְבֹנָֽה׃ <WH3828> frankincense

וֶֽהֱבִיאָ֗הּ <WH935> And he shall bring אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹן֮ <WH175> it to Aaron's הַכֹּהֲנִים֒ <WH3548> the priests וְקָמַ֨ץ <WH7061> and he shall take מִשָּׁ֜ם <WH8033> thereout מְלֹ֣א <WH4393> all along קֻמְצ֗וֹ <WH7062> handful מִסָּלְתָּהּ֙ <WH5560> of the flour וּמִשַּׁמְנָ֔הּ <WH8081> thereof and of the oil עַ֖ל <WH5921> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all לְבֹנָתָ֑הּ <WH3828> thereof with all the frankincense וְהִקְטִ֨יר <WH6999> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> thereof and the priest אֶת־ <WH853> אַזְכָּרָתָהּ֙ <WH234> the memorial הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> of it upon the altar אִשֵּׁ֛ה <WH801> [to be] an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְהַנּוֹתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3498> And the remnant מִן־ <WH4480> of the grain הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> of the meat offering לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> [shall be] Aaron's וּלְבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and his sons' קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> [it is] a thing most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy מֵאִשֵּׁ֥י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

וְכִ֥י <WH3588> for תַקְרִ֛ב <WH7126> And if thou bring קָרְבַּ֥ן <WH7133> an oblation מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> of a meat offering מַאֲפֵ֣ה <WH3989> baken תַנּ֑וּר <WH8574> in the oven סֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour חַלּ֤וֹת <WH2471> cakes מַצֹּת֙ <WH4682> [it shall be] unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <WH1101> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <WH7550> wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> or unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֥ים <WH4886> anointed בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> with oil ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> If מִנְחָ֥ה <WH4503> [be] a meat offering עַל־ <WH5921> on הַֽמַּחֲבַ֖ת <WH4227> [baken] in a pan קָרְבָּנֶ֑ךָ <WH7133> And if thy oblation סֹ֛לֶת <WH5560> it shall be [of] fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> with oil מַצָּ֥ה <WH4682> unleavened תִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

פָּת֤וֹת <WH6626> Thou shalt part אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> פִּתִּ֔ים <WH6595> it in pieces וְיָצַקְתָּ֥ <WH3332> and pour עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and שָׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> oil מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> thereon it [is] a meat offering הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> now if מִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> [be] a meat offering מַרְחֶ֖שֶׁת <WH4802> [baken] in the fryingpan קָרְבָּנֶ֑ךָ <WH7133> And if thy oblation סֹ֥לֶת <WH5560> [of] fine flour בַּשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> with oil תֵּעָשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> it shall be made

וְהֵבֵאתָ֣ <WH935> And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <WH4503> the meat offering אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which יֵעָשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> that is made מֵאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> of these לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of these things unto the LORD וְהִקְרִיבָהּ֙ <WH7126> and when it is presented אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> unto the priest וְהִגִּישָׁ֖הּ <WH5066> he shall bring אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> it unto the altar

וְהֵרִ֨ים <WH7311> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <WH3548> And the priest מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמִּנְחָה֙ <WH4503> from the meat offering אֶת־ <WH853> אַזְכָּ֣רָתָ֔הּ <WH234> a memorial וְהִקְטִ֖יר <WH6999> thereof and shall burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> [it] upon the altar אִשֵּׁ֛ה <WH801> [it is] an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְהַנּוֹתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3498> And that which is left מִן־ <WH4480> of the grain הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> of the meat offering לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> [shall be] Aaron's וּלְבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and his sons' קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> [it is] a thing most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy מֵאִשֵּׁ֥י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

כָּל־ <WH3605> any הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <WH4503> No meat offering אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which תַּקְרִ֙יבוּ֙ <WH7126> which ye shall bring לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> shall be made חָמֵ֑ץ <WH2557> with leaven כִּ֤י <WH3588> or כָל־ <WH3605> any שְׂאֹר֙ <WH7603> no leaven וְכָל־ <WH3605> any דְּבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> nor any honey לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַקְטִ֧ירוּ <WH6999> for ye shall burn מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> as אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> made by fire לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

קָרְבַּ֥ן <WH7133> As for the oblation רֵאשִׁ֛ית <WH7225> of the firstfruits תַּקְרִ֥יבוּ <WH7126> ye shall offer אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> them unto the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֥חַ <WH4196> on the altar לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יַעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> but they shall not be burnt לְרֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹֽחַ׃ <WH5207> for a sweet

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Every קָרְבַּ֣ן <WH7133> And every oblation מִנְחָתְךָ֮ <WH4503> of thy meat offering בַּמֶּ֣לַח <WH4417> with salt תִּמְלָח֒ <WH4414> shalt thou season וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַשְׁבִּ֗ית <WH7673> to be lacking מֶ֚לַח <WH4417> neither shalt thou suffer the salt בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of the covenant אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> of thy God מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> and מִנְחָתֶ֑ךָ <WH4503> from thy meat offering עַ֥ל <WH5921> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all קָרְבָּנְךָ֖ <WH7133> with all thine offerings תַּקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> thou shalt offer מֶֽלַח׃ <WH4417> salt ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> if תַּקְרִ֛יב <WH7126> And if thou offer מִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> a meat offering בִּכּוּרִ֖ים <WH1061> of thy firstfruits לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אָבִ֞יב <WH24> green ears קָל֤וּי <WH7033> of corn dried בָּאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> by the fire גֶּ֣רֶשׂ <WH1643> [even] corn beaten כַּרְמֶ֔ל <WH3759> out of full ears תַּקְרִ֕יב <WH7126> thou shalt offer אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> for the meat offering בִּכּוּרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1061> of thy firstfruits

וְנָתַתָּ֤ <WH5414> And thou shalt put עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> and שֶׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> oil וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <WH7760> upon it and lay עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and לְבֹנָ֑ה <WH3828> frankincense מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> thereon it [is] a meat offering הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וְהִקְטִ֨יר <WH6999> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> אַזְכָּרָתָ֗הּ <WH234> the memorial מִגִּרְשָׂהּ֙ <WH1643> of it [part] of the beaten corn וּמִשַּׁמְנָ֔הּ <WH8081> thereof and [part] of the oil עַ֖ל <WH5921> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all לְבֹנָתָ֑הּ <WH3828> thereof with all the frankincense אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> thereof [it is] an offering made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ
